name: Premium Yoga
description: Yoga is a group of physical, mental, and spiritual practices or disciplines that originated in ancient India, aimed at controlling and stilling the mind.

name: Premium Gym
description: A form of high intensity interval training, Premium Gym helps reach your desired fitness goal to another level.

name: Premium Treadmills
description: Our Premium Treadmills, generally used for walking, running, or climbing while staying in the same place, take your fitness goals ever further.
